title: I can't log in. Authenticating...
body: Hi guys I was playing League yesterday and then logged of to take a break. Then I tried to login again after awhile and I typed in the correct username and password but it got stuck in the authenticating part. It says Authenticating.... and nothing more, I waited like 15 minutes then gave up and thought that it was a temporarily problem so I waited to the next day but it didn't work today either. Why can't I log in and how do I fix this?

replies.body: this is happening to me right now at this very moment, so annoying...........

You may be having a network issue reaching our authentication servers, so it can't accept anything you submit.  Go through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot anything that may be blocking you from reaching us.  Let me know if you have any questions!
